chunks.zh: 聊聊在伦敦住青旅的日子
chunks.en: Talking about my days staying in a hostel in London

chunks.zh: 这次过年没有回家，而是偷偷瞒着家人和所有同事，一个人跑到了欧洲，逛了逛英国和爱尔兰。
chunks.en: This year I didn't go home for Chinese New Year. Instead, I secretly瞒着家人和所有同事ran off to Europe by myself, wandering around Britain and Ireland.

chunks.zh: 令我印象比较深刻的是在伦敦住青旅的那几天。
chunks.en: What impressed me most were my days staying in a hostel in London.

chunks.zh: 期间遇到一个同宿舍的中年白男，大概四五十岁，宿舍里还有 3 个比利时的妹子和她们的 2 个男性朋友。
chunks.en: During that time, I met a middle-aged white man in the same dorm, about forty or fifty years old. There were also 3 Belgian girls and their 2 male friends in the dorm.

chunks.zh:
![所住的青旅]( https://i.ibb.co/hFSYsJ2m/IMG20250129171259.jpg “所住的青旅”)

白男睡觉比较早，第一天晚上我回寝室时他已经睡着，直到第二天下午我才看到他，那时宿舍里只有我和他两个人，他下班回来洗澡，问我喜欢男的女的，是否是 gay ，他说他是双，随后他竟然给我看他的鸡巴，他问我尝试过大麻吗，我也并非谈麻色变之人，因为我之前在意大利也抽过几口，只是并没有任何感觉，据我了解大麻的成瘾性其实比普通香烟还低。
chunks.en:
![The hostel I stayed in]( https://i.ibb.co/hFSYsJ2m/IMG20250129171259.jpg “The hostel I stayed in”)

The white man went to bed early. The first night I returned to the dorm, he was already asleep. I didn't see him until the next afternoon. At that time, there were only two of us in the dorm. He came back from work and took a shower. He asked me if I liked men or women, and if I was gay. He said he was bi, and then he actually showed me his dick. He asked me if I had ever tried marijuana. Now, I am not the kind of person who turns pale at the mention of marijuana, because I had smoked a few puffs in Italy before, but I didn't feel anything. From what I understand, marijuana is actually less addictive than regular cigarettes.

chunks.zh: 我只是有点害怕他会对我做出什么举动，于是我赶紧出门，但是伦敦的街头太冷了，我走了几步路，又返回宿舍了，我想毕竟这是旅馆，他看着也慈眉善目的，大庭广众之下他肯定不会做出什么过分的东西。
chunks.en: I was just a little afraid that he would do something to me, so I quickly went out. But the streets of London were too cold. I took a few steps and went back to the dorm. I thought, after all, this is a hostel, and he looks kind, so he definitely wouldn't do anything too outrageous in public.

chunks.zh: 我回到宿舍，询问得知他是爱尔兰人，在工地干活。
chunks.en: I returned to the dorm and learned that he was Irish and worked on a construction site.

chunks.zh: 第二天晚上他又睡的很早，比利时的妹子们回来晚了，吵到他了，白男把他们骂了一顿。
chunks.en: The next night he went to bed very early again. The Belgian girls came back late and disturbed him. The white man scolded them.

chunks.zh: 然后比利时的人下去叫了管理，污蔑说白男动手打了他们，管理把它调到了另一个房间，还把他吼了一顿，实际上白男是有点冤的，毕竟是他休息被人吵到了。
chunks.en: Then the Belgians went downstairs to call the manager, falsely claiming that the white man had hit them. The manager moved him to another room and yelled at him. Actually, the white man was a bit wronged, after all, he was disturbed while resting.

chunks.zh: 我以为这就结束了，不会再见到他了。
chunks.en: I thought this was the end and I wouldn't see him again.

chunks.zh: 第二天晚上我去楼下的酒吧，竟然又碰到他了，他主动给我打了招呼，我询问他昨天休息得怎么样，他说他调换房间之后就再没睡着，于是在大厅躺到了天亮。
chunks.en: The next night I went to the bar downstairs and ran into him again. He took the initiative to say hello to me. I asked him how he slept yesterday. He said that he hadn't fallen asleep since he changed rooms, so he lay in the hall until dawn.

chunks.zh: 我告诉他今晚是我在伦敦的最后一晚，明天将回到中国。
chunks.en: I told him that tonight was my last night in London and I would be returning to China tomorrow.

chunks.zh: 他说“你应该庆祝这最后一晚，你知道，当你离开这里之后，一切又回到现实”。
chunks.en: He said, "You should celebrate this last night. You know, when you leave here, everything will return to reality."

chunks.zh: 白男也算外向，走过他面前的人，一旦有眼神对视，就会主动向对方问好，他告诉我这是他们的一种习惯。
chunks.en: The white man was also quite outgoing. Anyone who walked past him, once there was eye contact, would take the initiative to say hello. He told me that this was one of their habits.

chunks.zh: 他给了我他的邮箱，告诉我说即使你回到中国，我们也应该保持联系。
chunks.en: He gave me his email address and told me that even if I returned to China, we should stay in touch.

chunks.zh: 随后我们出去买了两瓶酒，回来的路上他抽了两口大麻，问我要不要尝试，我抽了几口，根本没有任何感觉。
chunks.en: Then we went out to buy two bottles of wine. On the way back, he took two puffs of marijuana and asked me if I wanted to try it. I took a few puffs, but didn't feel anything at all.

chunks.zh: 由于大麻是卷到香烟里的，抽得我都吐了，后面我们回到酒吧继续跟周围的人聊天。
chunks.en: Because the marijuana was rolled into a cigarette, I felt like vomiting. Later, we returned to the bar and continued chatting with people around us.

chunks.zh: 认识了一对女同，一个来自德国，一个来自瑞士，瑞士的妹子非常温柔，彬彬有礼的样子，我们聊了两个小时，期间出过旅馆到大街上站着干聊，又回到旅馆。
chunks.en: I met a lesbian couple, one from Germany and one from Switzerland. The Swiss girl was very gentle and polite. We chatted for two hours, during which we went out of the hostel to the street and chatted, then returned to the hostel.

chunks.zh: 后面一直聊到酒吧关门，我跟那对女同交换了 Instagram ，第二天退房，下午又走了两圈，晚上坐飞机回到了中国。
chunks.en: We chatted until the bar closed. I exchanged Instagram with the lesbian couple. The next day I checked out, took another two walks in the afternoon, and flew back to China at night.

chunks.zh: 性骚扰、引诱吸大麻之类的体验但凡在国内遭遇到一项，v 站评论区的画风绝对不是有趣之类的。
chunks.en: If you encounter experiences such as sexual harassment or being induced to smoke marijuana in China, the tone of the comments on V2EX would definitely not be "interesting" or similar.

chunks.zh: 出去/回家一段时间,像做了一场梦
chunks.en: Going out/returning home for a while is like having a dream.

chunks.zh: 三十多岁结婚后的几年，出差欧洲，然后一个人自驾德国，行程 10 天左右，都是住的青旅，经历和楼主差不多，深感欧洲人的自由感。
chunks.en: A few years after getting married in my thirties, I went to Europe on a business trip and then drove around Germany alone for about 10 days. I stayed in hostels the whole time and had similar experiences to the poster, deeply feeling the freedom of Europeans.

chunks.zh: 工作了，也有青旅旅游各处的机械工程师，也有和朋友一起浪的德国大学生。
chunks.en: There were mechanical engineers traveling to various places from hostels for work, and German college students partying with friends.

chunks.zh: 还有马来西亚的小哥，从华为离职开始周游欧洲。
chunks.en: There was also a Malaysian guy who quit Huawei and started traveling around Europe.

chunks.zh: 要是我以后有个孩子，我也让他去世界各地游历一番。
chunks.en: If I have a child in the future, I will let him travel around the world.

chunks.zh: 大麻一股农药味🤮，op 居然还抽了几口
chunks.en: Marijuana smells like pesticide 🤮, and OP actually took a few puffs.

chunks.zh: 一个人去伦敦挺厉害。
chunks.en: Going to London alone is quite impressive.

chunks.zh: 想问下，旅游中有什么好玩的事情？
chunks.en: I want to ask, what interesting things did you do during the trip?

chunks.zh: 去了哪些景点？
chunks.en: Which attractions did you go to?

chunks.zh: 这次一共大概花了多少钱？
chunks.en: How much did it cost in total this time?

chunks.zh: @gushu #37 那不一样，不同文化背景下相同行为背后的动机差异很大。
chunks.en: @gushu #37 That's different. The motivations behind the same behavior vary greatly in different cultural contexts.

chunks.zh: 东亚文化下有人给你看 jiji 的动机基本肯定就是要骚扰你；但在某些西方文化背景下我就能理解这种行为，更多的是分享和沟通。
chunks.en: In East Asian culture, someone showing you their jiji is almost certainly motivated by harassment; but in some Western cultural contexts, I can understand this behavior as more of sharing and communication.

chunks.zh: 不同意的人就骂我吧！😂
chunks.en: Those who disagree can scold me! 😂

chunks.zh: @yukino 确实很难闻
chunks.en: @yukino It really smells bad.

chunks.zh: @lucasj 并不厉害，做个飞机罢。
chunks.en: @lucasj It's not impressive, just taking a plane.

chunks.zh: 整趟下来一万块钱，景点的话没有逛收费的地方，我个人不太喜欢逛景点，喜欢在一个地方呆几天感受生活。
chunks.en: The whole trip cost 10,000 yuan. I didn't visit any paid attractions. Personally, I don't like visiting attractions. I like to stay in one place for a few days and experience life.

chunks.zh: 签证怎么办的啊
chunks.en: How did you get the visa?

chunks.zh: 跟妹子聊了哪些内容呢
chunks.en: What did you talk about with the girls?

chunks.zh: 青旅多少钱一晚
chunks.en: How much does a hostel cost per night?

chunks.zh: 我比较好奇签证是怎么搞定的？
chunks.en: I'm curious about how you got the visa?

chunks.zh: DIY?
chunks.en: DIY?

chunks.zh: 大麻英国放开了吗？
chunks.en: Is marijuana legal in the UK?

chunks.zh: 感受不同的生活方式挺好的
chunks.en: It's good to experience different lifestyles.

chunks.zh: 英国签证 DIY 很容易的
chunks.en: UK visa DIY is very easy

chunks.zh: 现在看，当年的伦敦青旅是多么的单纯
chunks.en: Looking back now, the London hostels of that time were so innocent.

chunks.zh: 想看 Instagram
chunks.en: Want to see Instagram

chunks.zh: @damnthatsfunny  OP 的英语是不是很好？
chunks.en: @damnthatsfunny Is OP's English very good?

chunks.zh: 我也经常在外游荡，一直想住青旅，无奈担心英语太差没法和其他人交流 ...
chunks.en: I also wander around a lot and have always wanted to stay in hostels, but I'm worried that my English is too poor to communicate with others...

chunks.zh: op 暗自庆幸菊部完好吧。
chunks.en: OP secretly rejoiced that his chrysanthemum was intact.

chunks.zh: 我也遇到过给我看 那货 的男人，叫我采他菊，我一阵恶心，跑了。
chunks.en: I have also met men who showed me "that thing" and asked me to touch their anus. I felt disgusted and ran away.

chunks.zh: 写的真好，真的要多出去走走，看看多彩的世界
chunks.en: Well written, you really need to go out and see the colorful world more.
